definitions.definition: The simplest aliphatic alcohol , CH 3 OH; a colourless , toxic , inflammable liquid , used as a solvent , antifreeze , in the chemical industry , and in the preparation of methylated spirit .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) The simplest aliphatic alcohol , CH 3 OH; a colourless , toxic , inflammable liquid , used as a solvent , antifreeze , in the chemical industry , and in the preparation of methylated spirit .
